title: Transportation and Communication Networks in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What percentage of Timor-Leste's road network is paved?
Which of the following is NOT a major challenge for Timor-Leste's road network?
What is the approximate mobile phone penetration rate in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT a major mobile network provider in Timor-Leste?
What is the approximate internet penetration rate in Timor-Leste?
Which type of public transportation is commonly used in urban areas of Timor-Leste?
What is the term for small trucks used for rural transport in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is a major challenge for rural connectivity in Timor-Leste?
choices: Power supply challenges for maintaining communication infrastructure
Too many competing internet service providers
questions.answer: Power supply challenges for maintaining communication infrastructure

questions.question: Which sustainable transportation solution from another developing country involves aerial ropeways?
What type of bicycles were developed as a sustainable transportation solution in Ghana?
Which sector is NOT mentioned as being impacted by improved connectivity in Timor-Leste?
What is the total length of Timor-Leste's road network?
Which of the following is a key challenge for rural transportation in Timor-Leste?
What type of internet connection do many areas in Timor-Leste rely on?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a potential application of sustainable transportation solutions in Timor-Leste?
choices: Adapting motorcycle ambulances for remote healthcare access
Implementing bicycle sharing programs in urban areas
Exploring solar-powered boat transportation for coastal communities

questions.question: What is a major challenge for expanding communication networks in rural Timor-Leste?
choices: High cost of connectivity relative to income
questions.answer: High cost of connectivity relative to income

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of how improved connectivity can impact healthcare in Timor-Leste?
choices: Elimination of all rural health clinics

questions.question: What role can renewable energy play in improving connectivity in remote areas of Timor-Leste?
choices: It has no relevance to connectivity
It can power communication infrastructure in areas with limited electricity
It can replace the need for communication networks entirely
It can only be used for transportation, not communication
questions.answer: It can power communication infrastructure in areas with limited electricity

questions.question: Which of the following is a potential unintended consequence of rapidly improving connectivity in rural areas?
choices: Potential disruption of traditional social structures
questions.answer: Potential disruption of traditional social structures

questions.question: What is the term for motorcycle taxis commonly used in cities of Timor-Leste?
Which of the following best describes the state of 4G/LTE coverage in Timor-Leste?
choices: Widespread coverage across the entire country
Limited coverage, mainly in urban areas
Full coverage in both urban and rural areas
questions.answer: Limited coverage, mainly in urban areas

questions.question: What is a key challenge for maintaining communication infrastructure in rural Timor-Leste?
choices: Too much competition among service providers

questions.question: Which sector is mentioned as potentially benefiting from improved market access due to better connectivity?
What type of transportation solution was developed in Uganda for rural healthcare access?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a potential impact of improved transportation and communication networks on education in Timor-Leste?
choices: Elimination of the need for physical schools
questions.answer: Elimination of the need for physical schools

questions.question: What is a key challenge for digital literacy in rural Timor-Leste?
choices: Lack of interest in digital tools
Limited access to digital devices and internet
questions.answer: Limited access to digital devices and internet

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of how improved connectivity can impact disaster response in Timor-Leste?
choices: Eliminating the need for disaster preparedness
Increasing the frequency of natural disasters
Reducing the role of emergency services

questions.question: What type of transportation is suggested for coastal communities in Timor-Leste, inspired by solutions from other countries?
Which of the following is a suggested community-based solution for improving rural connectivity?
What is the primary mode of inter-city travel in Timor-Leste?
choices: Privately operated minibuses and shared taxis
questions.answer: Privately operated minibuses and shared taxis
